import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const EmployeeForm = () => { const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState( { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', position: '', salary: '' } ) const handleChange = (event) => { setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:5000/employees') .then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } const validateEmail = (email) => { const regexp = /^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/; return regexp.test(email); } return (

Add an Employee
) } export default EmployeeForm
